name: 沉默沼泽
description:
As an ordinary policewoman, you live an ordinary life every day，But this peaceful life collapsed in an instant.
All of a sudden, you become a murderer! The victim is a master who loves you deeply! You know you're innocent! How should you deal with this sudden frame-up？How can you escape this tight encirclement when you become the target of police arrest？And what kind of secret is hidden behind all this？You are struggling desperately in this silent swamp，is there enough courage and wisdom to uncover the truth wrapped in heavy fog？Everything is in your choice，as long as you can hold out until the end，all the answers will be revealed by you.

Feature:
“Huge branch line”: Numerous long-term plots, different options experience different storylines, the ending is beyond your imagination.

“The picture is vivid and the music is moving”: The combination of scenery music and storyline, full of urgency, bringing users into stories gives people a feeling of being there.

“Ups and downs of the game system”: Different options in the game will affect your whole life, be sure to think carefully, It is difficult to return to the identity of the police without the prudence of the past.

“Games are combined with real life”: The storyline in the game is similar to Real case in real life, has a certain authenticity, it can attract users to devote themselves to the work.

“Professional emotional setting”: The game involves professional qualifications such as lawyers, police, forensic gangsters. You can experience the professional ethics and professional content, In the process of playing games, you can also experience the hardships of different professions.
